name: The Black Sheep Agency
tagline: Activating people around things that matter
description:
We work with brands and organizations interested in activating people around things that matter. 
We’re more than marketers—we’re brand activists, giving a damn about the world around us and a voice to causes that impact our communities. We build brands, design globe-shifting work, engage communities, tell compelling stories and launch campaigns that achieve results.
We are a certified B Corp and uncertified ambassadors for the great city of Houston.
